title: Mario Kart
short_plot_summary: Characters from the Mario universe race against each other in go-karts, using power-ups to gain an advantage and win the race.
explanation: A racing car, representing the go-karts that the characters race in
A mushroom, symbolizing the power-up that gives racers a speed boost
A star, illustrating the invincibility power-up that racers can get
A lightning bolt, signifying the power-up that shrinks and slows down all the other racers
A banana, representing the power-up that racers can use to make other racers slip and lose control of their go-karts
